General.Name: Pum-Tech Korea Co. Ltd
General.Description: Pumtech Korea Co.,Ltd. produces and markets cosmetics dispensers and airless packages in South Korea and internationally. It offers bottles, dispensers, compacts, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea. Pumtech Korea Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Bookuk T&C Co., Ltd.
